list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a bird, often vividly colored, with a short down-curved hooked bill, grasping feet, and a raucous voice, found especially in the tropics and feeding on fruits and seeds. Many are popular as cage birds, and some are able to mimic the human voice.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: encouraging students to parrot back information
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: khuyến khích sinh viên vẹt lùi thông tin
